name: ABAuthorizationStatus
desc: Different possible values for the authorization status of an app with respect to address book data.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: No authorization status could be determined.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: The app is not authorized to access address book data. The user cannot change this access, possibly due to restrictions such as parental controls.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The user explicitly denied access to address book data for this app.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: The app is authorized to access address book data.
